name: Super Truck
description:
Ever experience your driving skill in the wonderland? Take a look at our latest game production; high quality graphic designs with an unique touch in soften tone in colour selection. Super Truck will guild you through to experience different tracks and journeys. Please safely deliver your goods to the require destination, in order to complete every task. Ready to start your driving lesson? START NOW~

HOW TO PLAY?
1.Players are required to drive truck stably the content may falls off during delivery.
2.Tracks can be bumpily, control your device stably to ensure you achieve best ranking in each competition.
3.Control your direction with the arrows provide on the panel.
